name: atomic-blueprintlib
description: A framework for using blueprints to generate Atomic game objects.

scripts.decl: dts-generator --name atomic-blueprintlib --project ./ --out dist/atomic-blueprintlib.d.ts --exclude typings/Atomic/Atomic.d.ts --exclude typings/Atomic/**/*.d.ts --exclude node_modules/**/*.d.ts --exclude /dist/*.d.ts

author: T. Shaddock Heath
